document_data.mainbody:
Enchanted hammer was a spell used by clerics of Laduguer.
This spell was used to enchant a smithys hammer. The hammer had to made from either mithral or silver. When this hammer was used the make armor or metal weapons such as swords, said items became stronger than if forged using a regular hammer. The spell allowed the smithy to make either one full suit of armor, two large weapons or four smaller weapons such as daggers  or arrow heads.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required a material component, the holy symbol of Laduguer.
